data.actual_result: The embed for the file shown, conflicting the description in the option that we enabled earlier
data.expected_result: They shouldn't embed and only shows the filename, file size, and download button
data.short_description: Embed shows for files uploaded directly to Discord that larger than 10 MB
data.steps_to_repro: - NOTE: You must have Discord Nitro to reproduce this - Have a video or image larger than 10 MB but smaller than 50 MB - Make sure that "When uploaded directly to Discord" is enabled in User Settings > Text & Images - Upload it and observe the uploaded file
